introduction.description: Garments Order & Production Tracker System (GOPTS) is a web-based platform that helps garment factories manage orders, production stages, and workflows. This Privacy Policy explains how information is collected, used, stored, and protected when using the system.
introduction.agreement: By using GOPTS, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

howWeUseInformation: Track garment orders and production workflows
Maintain accurate production and inventory logs
Ensure security and prevent unauthorized access

measures: Regular system updates and security monitoring
dataStorageAndSecurity.note: Users are responsible for maintaining strong passwords and safeguarding login credentials.

cookiesAndTracking.optional: Users may disable cookies, but some system features may not function properly.

allowedWhenNecessary: With hosting or service providers for system operation
When required by law or legal processes
To ensure system security and protect users
dataSharing.notShared: GOPTS does not sell or share personal or business data with third-party advertisers.

userRights: Request deletion of account or data

dataRetention.policy: Data is retained as long as the user's account is active or required for system operations.
dataRetention.note: Some operational data may remain for record-keeping unless deletion is specifically requested.

thirdPartyIntegrations.description: If GOPTS uses third-party services (e.g., hosting, email systems), those services may process data according to their own privacy policies.
thirdPartyIntegrations.advice: Users should review third-party policies when applicable.

policyUpdates.description: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically.
policyUpdates.agreement: Continued use of the system indicates acceptance of updated terms.
